bill.constitutionalAuthorityStatementText: [Congressional Record Volume 169, Number 43 (Tuesday, March 7, 2023)][House]From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]By Ms. NORTON:H.R. 1416.Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuantto the following:clause 18 of section 8 of article I of the ConstitutionThe single subject of this legislation is:This bill would establish a Federal Retirement ThriftInvestment Board Inspector General.[Page H1152]

item.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Accountability.
Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E189)

summary.text:
Federal Retirement Thrift Investment Board Inspector General Act of 2023

This bill establishes a Federal Retirement Thrift Investment Board Inspector General.

bill.title: Federal Retirement Thrift Investment Board Inspector General Act of 2023

item.title: Federal Retirement Thrift Investment Board Inspector General Act of 2023
Federal Retirement Thrift Investment Board Inspector General Act of 2023
To amend title 5, United States Code (commonly referred to as the Inspector General Act of 1978), to establish a Federal Retirement Thrift Investment Board Inspector General, and for other purposes.

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Accountability.

dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.
dublinCore.dc:contributor: Congressional Research Service, Library of Congress
dublinCore.dc:description: This file contains bill summaries and statuses for federal legislation. A bill summary describes the most significant provisions of a piece of legislation and details the effects the legislative text may have on current law and federal programs. Bill summaries are authored by the Congressional Research Service (CRS) of the Library of Congress. As stated in Public Law 91-510 (2 USC 166 (d)(6)), one of the duties of CRS is "to prepare summaries and digests of bills and resolutions of a public general nature introduced in the Senate or House of Representatives". For more information, refer to the User Guide that accompanies this file.
